#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int m[200010][26];

int main() {
  string s;
  int q;
  cin >> s;
  int n = s.size();
  for (int j = 0; j < 26; ++j) m[0][j] = 0;
  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
    for (int j = 0; j < 26; ++j) {
      m[i + 1][j] = m[i][j] + int(char('a' + j) == s[i]);
    }
  }
  cin >> q;
  while (q--) {
    int l, r;
    cin >> l >> r;
    --l;
    bool senar = false;
    int ans = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < 26; ++i) {
      int x = m[r][i] - m[l][i];
      if (x % 2 == 1) senar = true;
      ans += 2 * (x / 2);
    }
    cout << ans + senar << endl;
  }
}
